postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y apache2 mariadb-server php php-mysqli git-lfs && curl -L https://bin.equinox.io/c/bNyj1mQVY4c/ngrok-v3-stable-linux-amd64.tgz | tar xvz && sudo mv ngrok /usr/local/bin/
postStartCommand: bash -c "set -x; sudo service mariadb start; sudo sed -i 's|DocumentRoot /var/www/html|DocumentRoot /workspaces/AplusSQL|' /etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf; sudo service apache2 start; ngrok config add-authtoken $NGROK_AUTHTOKEN" > /workspaces/AplusSQL/startup.log 2>&1
